description: This Course covers the Quantitative Analysis Section of the FRM (Financial Risk Manager) Level 1 Certification Course. The Course, provided by ApnaCourse, covers 14 video lectures across topics such as Probabilities, Statistics, Distributions, Hypothesis Testing, Confidence Interval, Regressions, Correlation and Monte Carlo Series. All these topics are significant topics of the Quantitative Analysis (QA) Section. The QA is one of the 4 sections of the FRM Level 1 exam and is a very important section as it forms the basis of understanding Financial Risks.
title: Financial Risk Manager (FRM) Certification - Level 1 - QA
